level.heading: Availability of other remedies.
level.text: The provisions of this subchapter shall not limit the availability of other remedies under law or other equitable relief whether or not an adequate remedy exists at law.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see ยง 1310 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-376, July 24, 2000, 47 DCR 6574).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see ยง 1310 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-172, see notes following ยง 42-3601.
